meanings.definition: The quality or state of being secluded or isolated.
meanings.sent1: Her seclusiveness made it difficult for her to make new friends.
meanings.sent2: The seclusiveness of the cabin in the woods provided a peaceful retreat.
meanings.sent3: The cat's seclusiveness was evident as it hid under the bed during the party.
meanings.sent4: The seclusiveness of the island gave it an air of mystery and intrigue.
meanings.sent5: The seclusiveness of the library allowed her to study in quiet solitude.

meanings.definition: The act of shutting oneself off from others.
meanings.sent1: His seclusiveness was a result of his fear of social interactions.
meanings.sent2: After a long day at work, she craved the seclusiveness of her own room.
meanings.sent3: The seclusiveness of the student during lunch break raised some eyebrows.
meanings.sent4: The seclusiveness of the artist fueled rumors about his mysterious lifestyle.
meanings.sent5: The seclusiveness of the hermit was legendary in the small town.
